description: This trap indicates that a Call Signalling channel to a Remote Gateway has been opened.
This trap has been replaced with sonusGwSigChanOpenNotification.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-GATEWAY-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusGwCallSigChanOpenNotification SONUS-GATEWAY-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusGwRemoteGwName s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: Name of the remote Gateway.
variables.name: SONUS-GATEWAY-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusGwRemoteGwName

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that a Call Signalling channel to a Remote Gateway has been closed.
This trap has been replaced with sonusGwSigChanCloseNotification.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-GATEWAY-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusGwCallSigChanCloseNotification SONUS-GATEWAY-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusGwRemoteGwName s EXAMPLE SONUS-GATEWAY-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusGwCloseReasonCode i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel
